Despite being out for 6 years, the game seems unfinished in some areas and massive improvements are needed. In some instances you get rewarded for doing nothing and some challenges encourage you not to engage in certain game-play. Matchmaking is absolutely awful. If you are a new killer, you get survivors with over 1000 hours, and vice versa. DO NOT PLAY THIS FUCKING GAME. Seriously, you are better off with any other online game. I could go into detail about the numerous bugs, general design issues, etc etc but i wanna keep this review short. Fuck you BHVR. Just fix this goddamn game.

Best fun if you have a full party of 5. Pretty well balanced for how many perks and items there are to choose from for so many survivors and killers you can play as. Most of the survivors and killers you have to purchase or farm for a long time for but it doesn't ruin the experience at all, in my opinion as the only things you can purchase for a survivor/killer once you have them are purely cosmetic things and there aren't any examples of someone spending $300 and then being completely OP. If you're looking for a good spooky time with friends, this is def what you're looking for :)

This game has so many bugs, so many problems with meta and power level, and the developers don't give a single fuck. They add more content than they fix, and continue to let problems fester. 

Updates are super unoptimized, with an update that would take a normal game 10 minutes taking well over an hour. The public test builds are an absolute fucking joke. Bugs, glitches, and features that blatantly don't work make their way into the main game, where they fix them maybe a few weeks later, maybe a few months. 

Massive power level difference between killers, which is amplified by some killers having absolute dog shit add-ons, and others having ones that turn them into gods. 

Just hold W as a survivor and 80% of killers just lose the game. The only skillful thing you can do as a survivor is loop, and most of the time, it's not the optimal thing to do, and some killers completely negate this.

Survivors are encouraged to bring Exhaustion perks, further exemplified by the recent change to Dead Hard, which makes it so when you would have gotten a hit, they scream as if going down, then proceed to run away. These perks make the meta of holding W even stronger.

meta Generator Slowdown perks are literally required for killer unless the survivors are making mistakes, and can become oppressive with certain builds.

MMR has made it so every game is a lose-lose. Did you escape or sacrifice three survivors? Now you get to go against better survivors who might completely stomp you. Did you die or get 0 - 1 kills? GG EZ Baby, git gud. 

Devs literally don't listen to the players. It took them a couple of years to fix how broken Spirit was, how underwhelming Trapper was, how bad pig was (Who now got a buff... With the rework of add-ons...). 

The grind is so BS, and is even greater on the killer side. As a survivor, you can easily get all perks on your favorite survivor. Hell, in 1130 hours, with four level 50 survivors, I have two survivors with all of their perks. I currently have 0 killers with all of their perks, which is the side where perks have a bigger impact. You get about two perks for every 88,000 blood points spent (according to an online source with lots of data). With a cap of 1,000,000 total bloodpoints in your inventory, and a cap of 32,000 with perks or add-ons, you get an average of 1 perk every game. Daily challenges will get you barely half a blood web, and with the tome, you can get a nice amount of extra blood points, but it's not nearly enough to be worth it.

I constantly have to take months off from this game, because it gets so frustrating seeing how little the devs care, how broken the game is, how the experience of killer has been going slowly downhill, and survivor hasn't been improving much at all either, and some may argue has been going downhil (although the last few patches, as of the review, introduced boons, hit reg Dead Hard, and some perk buffs for both sides). Also, the most fun way to play survivor, with friends, literally breaks the game, tipping the scales in the survivors favor. There's no good way to balance it, so nothing can be really done with it except buff solo-que's without buffing teams, which is nearly impossible. 

I can't recommend a game where the devs care so little about the game, and constantly miss the mark on what the community wants. The only good thing about this game is the art department, whose always on point.

Dead by Daylight is in a constant state of flux. New content is added every three months and helps to keep the game fresh. There are always bugs to deal with, balance issues that can make the game feel very one sided. (opinion varies on who is the superior power [survivors/killers]) People get mad about how YOU play the game vs. how they feel you should play. Play it however you want, accept the salt that will inevitably to come your way. 

It's not a bad game... and most of the time is actually quite enjoyable. Just play how you feel you would enjoy it. I always try to take the other side into account with my play style. It's all on you. I enjoy it, and feel it will continue to be a solid game for at least a couple more years.

игра говна, тупого говна. с убитым балансом. игра для сурвов. только для сурвов. изза чего в последнее время стало слишком много туннелинга, кемпинга со стороны маньяков. поиск лобби при игре на мане, это совершенно отдельная история. со скрытым ммр, в зависимости от скилла игры на определенном маньяке, который работает как из жопы. как может ман с 8мью часами попасться против стака сурвов с 3к+ часов в дбд? бедный ман, потерянный, который совершенно не знает что делать. мне было жаль этого мана... и что, считаете, у этого человека будет желание продолжать играть в такую игру? не работает орех у сурвов, конечно мы его починим, и починим так, что со стороны мана ты наносишь хит, кровище по экране, но сурв бежит дальше. это считается адекватно? конечно, давайте продолжим помогать сурвам, вводя новые тотемы, который в новом обновление позволит сурвам со скоростью 100% подниматься из предсмертного состояния. браво. желания играть на манах, из-за кучи аспектов просто отсутствует. играть на сурвах, когда из катки в катку, натыкаешься на вечный туннелинг и кемпинг, тоже отбивает все желание. заходишь с друзьями почиллить, побегать, позоводить генчики, но вместо этого встречаешь фейскемп и туннелинг. а все почему? правильно, потому что отыгрывать на маньяках иначе, уже не возможно. в данный момент не буду советовать к приобретению новым игрокам. она не стоит вашего времени

Ich würde sagen, jeder der gern wegetunnelt, weggecampt oder einfach nur m1 drücken möchte, für den ist das Game ein wahres Paradies. Nicht zu vergessen, die bugs, glitches und wundervollen Mates, die einen hängen lassen, nicht wissen, wie man m1 drückt oder denken, sie haben so große eier, die müssen sie erstmal dem killer präsentieren. 

Also eine wahre vielfalt. Gönnt euch!

If you value your sanity, do not buy this game. The devloper does not care in the slightest about everyone having fun, they only care about the survivors having fun. (On higher skill level) SWF Groups will just bully and taunt you to the point you genuinely hope they are un-alive in real life. The grind to get perks and items is horrible and heavily RNG based, balance among killers is completely neglected. Maps are complete dogshit gameplay wise.

If you have 4 friends and just want to have fun in private matches it can work I guess but please, if you decide to buy this game, do not try to get good. Being good or even just decent like me takes out the fun COMPLETELY. Oh yeah and it takes hundreds of hours to get kinda decent at the game.

This game is like a drug and I mean that in the worst way possible. It (or more specifically the players) hurt you physically and mentally, leave you exhausted and deranged. And the dealer has no intention of fixing that but you just can't quit completely.
Nice Graphics, Good detail and nice Lore. I recommend DbD!
